Package shef.mt.features.impl.gb

This package contains implementations of Glassbox features

See: Description

    Feature2048
    ratio of log prob (base model score) of the current hypothesis to the sum of the log prob score of all hypothesis
    Feature2049
    average size of hypotheses in the n-best list
    Feature2050
    n-best list density (vocabulary size / average sentence length)
    Feature2051

    edit distance of the current hypothesis to the center hypothesis
    Feature2053
    percentage of other hypothesis with and edit distance to the centre < (current hypothesis edit distance to the centre * 0.5)
    Feature2054
